description: Continued fraction for the 2nd Du Bois-Reymond constant.
references: Francois Le Lionnais, Les nombres remarquables, Paris, Hermann 1983, pp. 23.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Du Bois-Reymond Constants.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2, -1).
mathematica: Join[{0}, LinearRecurrence[{2, -1}, {5, 7}, 100]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 20 2012 *)ContinuedFraction[(E^2 - 7)/2, 40] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Feb 20 2012 *)
